name: FLY8MA Pilot Lodge
about: FLY8MA Pilot Lodge, located in Big Lake, Alaska, offers advanced flight training in a unique and challenging environment. Our programs include private pilot, instrument rating, commercial pilot, and certified flight instructor training, all tailored to individual goals and timelines. The 115-acre property features 360-degree mountain views, two private runways, and is close to Anchorage, glaciers, and prime hunting and fishing grounds. Students can stay in converted airplane homes, including a DC-6 and DC-9, providing a one-of-a-kind experience. Our instructors ensure a fun and educational experience, with a focus on safety, competence, and confidence. We also offer online ground school courses and guarantee a 100% pass rate for FAA written exams and checkrides. Join us to experience the wonders of Alaska by air and become a safe, competent, and confident pilot.
